Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Seamstress \Seam"stress\ (?; 277), n. [From older seamster, properly fem., AS. se['a]mestre. See {Seam}.] A woman whose occupation is sewing; a needlewoman. [1913 Webster]
seamstress n : someone who makes or mends dresses [syn: {dressmaker}, {modiste}, {needlewoman}, {sempstress}]
